did.head: Overview of the Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Xavier University Archives and Special Collections

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Xavier University (Cincinnati, Ohio). Master of Public Administration Program

did.unittitle: Xavier University Master of Public Administration Program records
did.abstract: Records generated by the short-lived Xavier University Master of Public Administration Program are represented in this collection.

bioghist.head: History of Xavier University Master of Public Administration Program
bioghist.p: The idea of formulating a Master of Public Administration Program at Xavier University was conceived in the 1970s. The program itself began in the 1981 but was terminated in 1986. At the time of its termination this program was apparently part of the College of Professional Studies.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection includes correspondence and reports on the formation and the dissolution of the Master of Public Administration Program at Xavier University.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are arranged by folders in reverse chronological order. This maintains the original filing order of the documents.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Materials in this collection have restricted access. Please contact the archives staff.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box Number, Folder Number, XUA-70, Xavier University Master of Public Administration Program records, Special Collections and University Archives, Xavier University, Cincinnati, Ohio.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
